GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v5.15.87
GSD.description:
tpm: tpm_crb: Add the missed acpi_put_table() to fix memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.87 by commit 986cd9a9b95423e35a2cbb8e9105aec0e0d7f337, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit 30fc8d138e9123f374a3c3867e7c7c5cd4004941. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tpm: tpm_crb: Add the missed acpi_put_table() to fix memory leak
